---
title: "Regression"
output: html_notebook
---

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(car)
```

```{r}
# Load the data
data("Salaries", package = "car")
# Inspect the data
sample_n(Salaries, 3)
```
```{r}
# Compute the model
model <- lm(salary ~ sex, data = Salaries)
summary(model)$coef %>%
  round(digits = 2)
```
  
  
```{r}
model2 <- lm(salary ~ yrs.service + rank + discipline + sex,
             data = Salaries)
Anova(model2)
```
```{r}
summary(model2)$coef %>%
  round(digits = 2)
```
 
```{r}
model3 <- lm(salary ~ yrs.service + rank + discipline + sex,
             data = Salaries)
Anova(model3)
```
```{r}
summary(model3)$coef %>%
  round(digits = 2)
```
